org.apache.jackrabbit.ocm.manager.collectionconverter.impl
Class ResidualNodesCollectionConverterImpl

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.jackrabbit.ocm.manager.collectionconverter.impl.AbstractCollectionConverterImpl
      org.apache.jackrabbit.ocm.manager.collectionconverter.impl.ResidualNodesCollectionConverterImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
CollectionConverter
public class ResidualNodesCollectionConverterImpl
extends AbstractCollectionConverterImpl

The ResidualNodesCollectionConverterImpl is a collection converter for multiple child nodes accessed through Node.getNodes(String pattern).

Author:
Felix Meschberger
